data.title: KXNG Crooked: Life, Career, Net Worth, Bio/Wiki 2024
data.meta_description: Kxng Crooked is a talented rapper who has been making music for a long time. He is known for his powerful voice, clever lyrics.....
data.text:
Kxng Crooked is a well-known rapper with a big name in the music world. He was born as Dominick Antron Wickliffe, but many people know him by his stage name, Kxng Crooked. His music is loved by many people who enjoy hip hop, a type of music where artists often rap about their lives and experiences. Kxng Crooked has a unique style and a powerful way of telling stories through his songs.

He has been a part of the music industry for many years and has made a big impact. He is best known for being a member of a famous rap group called Slaughterhouse. This group had other talented rappers like Joe Budden, Joell Ortiz, and Royce da 5’9″. Together, they made amazing music that fans still enjoy today. Kxng Crooked’s journey in the music world is full of hard work, passion, and dedication.

Kxng Crooked’s music isn’t just about catchy beats and rhymes. He often talks about real-life issues and challenges that people face. This makes his music relatable and meaningful to his fans. He has a special way of connecting with people through his words and music. In this article, we’ll learn more about who Kxng Crooked is, his early life, career, and other interesting facts.

Who is Kxng Crooked?

Kxng Crooked is a talented rapper who has been making music for a long time. He is known for his powerful voice, clever lyrics, and deep messages in his songs. Many people admire him for his honesty and the way he talks about real-life issues in his music. He has a strong fan base who appreciate the stories he shares through his songs.

Kxng Crooked first became famous as a member of Slaughterhouse, a rap group that brought together some of the best rappers in the hip hop world. The group made a lot of great music together, and their fans loved the energy and creativity they brought to their songs. Even though the group isn’t making music together anymore, Kxng Crooked continues to shine as a solo artist.

His music often talks about the struggles and challenges he has faced in life. He uses his experiences to inspire others and to let them know they are not alone in their struggles. Kxng Crooked is not just a rapper; he is also a storyteller who uses his music to share important messages with the world.

Real Name and Ethnicity

Kxng Crooked was born with the name Dominick Antron Wickliffe. This is the name his family gave him when he was born, but as he grew up and became a rapper, he chose the stage name Kxng Crooked. A stage name is a special name that artists use when they perform or create music. Kxng Crooked chose this name to represent himself in the music world.

You can also visit our other articles: https://infolifestory.com/biography/ginny-cha/

Kxng Crooked is an African American, which means his family has roots in Africa. His ethnicity is an important part of who he is, and it influences his music in many ways. He often talks about his culture and the experiences of African Americans in his songs. His music reflects the pride he has in his heritage and the challenges that come with it.

By using his real name and his stage name, Kxng Crooked connects with his fans in different ways. His real name, Dominick Antron Wickliffe, reminds us that he is a real person with a life outside of music. His stage name, Kxng Crooked, shows the strong, confident artist he has become. Both names are important to his identity and his journey as a rapper.

Early Life and Education

Kxng Crooked was born and raised in Long Beach, California. This city is known for its rich music culture, especially in hip hop. Growing up in Long Beach had a big influence on Kxng Crooked and his love for music. Childhood immersed him in music, which became a vital life component. The artists and musicians around him inspired him. They helped him develop a unique style.

During his early years, Kxng Crooked faced many challenges. Life was not always easy for him, and he had to work hard to overcome obstacles. Despite these challenges, he was determined to follow his passion for music. He spent a lot of time writing lyrics and practicing his rapping skills. Music became his way of expressing himself and dealing with the difficulties he faced.

Kxng Crooked’s education was also an important part of his life. He attended school in Long Beach, where he learned a lot, not just from his teachers, but also from his experiences outside of school. While he was in school, he continued to develop his music skills. He knew that he wanted to be a rapper, and he worked hard to make his dream come true. His early life and education helped shape the artist he is today.

Wife and Girlfriend

Kxng Crooked is known for keeping his personal life private, especially when it comes to his relationships. While he shares a lot about his life and experiences through his music, he prefers to keep details about his romantic life away from the public eye. His wife or girlfriend stays in the shadows. He focuses on his career and music in the spotlight.

Many artists, like Kxng Crooked, decide to keep their personal relationships private to protect their loved ones and to keep some parts of their lives separate from their careers. This can be important for maintaining a balance between their public and private lives. Fans often respect this decision and appreciate the music and messages that the artist shares with the world.

Although Kxng Crooked does not talk much about his personal relationships, his music often reflects his feelings and experiences. Through his songs, listeners can get a glimpse into his emotions and thoughts, even if he does not directly talk about his wife or girlfriend. This is one of the reasons why fans feel connected to him and his music.

Age, Weight, Height, and Physical Appearance

Kxng Crooked was born on September 23, 1978, which makes him 45 years old as of 2024. He has been in the music industry for many years and has gained a lot of experience and wisdom over time. Even though he has been in the spotlight for a long time, he continues to create new music and inspire his fans.

In terms of his physical appearance, Kxng Crooked is known for his strong and confident presence. He is a tall man, standing at about 6 feet 2 inches (188 cm) in height. This height gives him a commanding presence on stage, where he performs with a lot of energy and passion. His weight is around 210 pounds (95 kg), which complements his tall frame and adds to his powerful stage presence.

Kxng Crooked’s appearance is also marked by his distinct style. He often wears casual yet stylish clothes that reflect his personality and the hip hop culture. He is known for his love of hats and sunglasses, which are often part of his signature look. His physical appearance, along with his strong voice and lyrical skills, make him a memorable figure in the music industry.

Career

Kxng Crooked’s career in the music industry is both long and successful. He began his journey as a rapper at a young age, inspired by the rich hip hop culture around him in Long Beach, California. Over the years, he developed his skills and gained recognition for his unique style and powerful lyrics. His music often addresses important social issues, making it both entertaining and thought-provoking.

One of the biggest highlights of Kxng Crooked’s career was his time as a member of the rap supergroup Slaughterhouse. This group included other talented rappers like Joe Budden, Joell Ortiz, and Royce da 5’9″. Fans all over the world loved the music they created together. They gained recognition for their clever wordplay and deep messages. Their songs had energetic performances. Fans continue to appreciate the music of the group, even though they are no longer together.

After Slaughterhouse, Kxng Crooked continued to build his solo career. He released several albums and mixtapes that showcased his growth as an artist. His solo work is known for its honesty and depth, as he often shares personal stories and experiences through his music. Kxng Crooked’s career is a testament to his talent, hard work, and dedication to his craft.

Social Media Presence

In today’s world, social media is a big part of an artist’s life, and Kxng Crooked is no exception. He uses platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook to connect with his fans and share updates about his music and life. Social media allows him to interact with his followers in real-time, making him more accessible to his fans around the world.

Kxng Crooked often uses social media to promote his music and upcoming projects. He shares behind-the-scenes looks at his work, giving fans a glimpse into his creative process. This helps build excitement for his new releases and keeps his fans engaged with his content. Social media also allows him to share his thoughts on various topics, giving his followers a better understanding of his views and personality.

While Kxng Crooked is active on social media, he also knows the importance of balancing his online presence with his personal life. He shares enough to keep his fans informed and entertained, but he also keeps some aspects of his life private. This balance allows him to maintain a strong connection with his audience while still protecting his personal life.

Nationality and Religion

Kxng Crooked is an American rapper, born and raised in Long Beach, California. His nationality is American, and he takes pride in his roots and the culture of his country. The United States, especially California, has a rich history of hip hop, and Kxng Crooked’s music is a reflection of the environment he grew up in. His nationality has played a big role in shaping his music and the themes he explores in his lyrics.

When it comes to religion, Kxng Crooked has not publicly shared much about his beliefs. Like many artists, he prefers to keep certain aspects of his life private, including his religious views. However, his music often touches on themes of spirituality, struggle, and hope, which may give listeners some insight into his beliefs.

Kxng Crooked’s music is not just about entertainment; it’s also about sharing his thoughts and experiences. While he may not openly discuss his religion, the messages in his songs reflect his values and the things that are important to him. His nationality and culture are important parts of his identity, and they continue to influence his music and his life.

Net Worth

Kxng Crooked has worked hard throughout his career, and his success in the music industry has brought him financial rewards. As of 2024, his estimated net worth is around $5 million. This wealth has come from his music sales, live performances, and various business ventures. His talent and dedication have paid off, allowing him to enjoy a comfortable lifestyle.

Earning a net worth like this takes a lot of hard work, especially in the competitive world of music. Kxng Crooked has been in the industry for many years, and his consistent efforts have helped him build a strong financial foundation. He has not only earned money from his music but also from other opportunities that have come his way because of his fame and success.

Kxng Crooked’s net worth also allows him to give back to his community and support causes that are important to him. He understands the value of using his resources to make a positive impact, and he has been involved in various charitable activities. His success is not just about the money he has earned, but also about the difference he can make in the lives of others.

Legacy and Impact

Kxng Crooked’s legacy in the music world is one of talent, perseverance, and honesty. He has made a significant impact on the hip hop industry with his powerful lyrics and meaningful music. His work with Slaughterhouse and his solo career have both contributed to his reputation as one of the most respected rappers in the game. His music often addresses important social issues, making it both relevant and influential.

One of the key aspects of Kxng Crooked’s legacy is his commitment to staying true to himself. He has always used his music as a platform to share his real-life experiences and the challenges he has faced. This honesty has resonated with fans, who appreciate his willingness to be open and vulnerable in his songs. His impact goes beyond just music; it extends to the messages he shares and the lives he touches.

Kxng Crooked’s influence can also be seen in the artists he has inspired. Many up-and-coming rappers look up to him for his lyrical skills and his ability to navigate the music industry with integrity. His legacy is one of inspiration, showing others that it’s possible to achieve success while staying true to your values. Kxng Crooked’s impact on hip hop will be felt for many years to come.

Hobbies

Writing poetry and lyrics

Listening to classic hip hop albums

Watching documentaries about music history

Playing video games in his free time

Collecting vinyl records

Supporting young artists and mentoring them

Spending time with family and friends

Attending live concerts and music festivals

Exploring new music genres and sounds

Reading books about music and culture

Interesting Facts

Kxng Crooked’s stage name was originally Crooked I before he changed it to Kxng Crooked.

He was signed to Death Row Records, a famous record label, early in his career.

Kxng Crooked is known for his “Hip Hop Weekly” series, where he released a new song every week for a year.

He has collaborated with many famous artists, including Eminem and Snoop Dogg.

Kxng Crooked is a big advocate for mental health awareness and often talks about it in his music.

He is part of the C.O.B. (Circle of Bosses) crew, a group of like-minded artists and entrepreneurs.

Kxng Crooked has a deep love for jazz music and often incorporates jazz elements into his songs.

He has a tattoo that says “Life is Pain” on his arm, reflecting some of the struggles he has faced.

Kxng Crooked is very active in his community, often participating in charity events and fundraisers.

He has a passion for teaching and has given lectures about hip hop and music history.

FAQs

Q: What is Kxng Crooked’s real name?

A: Kxng Crooked’s real name is Dominick Antron Wickliffe. He chose the stage name Kxng Crooked to represent himself in the music world.

Q: What group was Kxng Crooked a part of?

A: Kxng Crooked was a member of the rap supergroup Slaughterhouse, along with Joe Budden, Joell Ortiz, and Royce da 5’9″.

Q: What type of music does Kxng Crooked make?

A: Kxng Crooked makes hip hop music, often focusing on real-life issues, personal experiences, and social justice topics in his lyrics.

Q: How tall is Kxng Crooked?

A: Kxng Crooked is about 6 feet 2 inches (188 cm) tall, giving him a strong presence on stage.

Q: Where is Kxng Crooked from?

A: Kxng Crooked is from Long Beach, California, a city known for its rich hip hop culture.

Q: Is Kxng Crooked active on social media?

A: Yes, Kxng Crooked is active on social media platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook, where he connects with his fans and shares updates about his music.

Q: What is Kxng Crooked’s net worth?

A: As of 2024, Kxng Crooked’s estimated net worth is around $5 million, earned from his music career and other ventures.

Q: What are some of Kxng Crooked’s hobbies?

A: Kxng Crooked enjoys writing poetry, listening to music, playing video games, and mentoring young artists, among other hobbies.

Q: Has Kxng Crooked ever collaborated with other famous artists?

A: Yes, Kxng Crooked has collaborated with many famous artists, including Eminem and Snoop Dogg.

Q: What is Kxng Crooked’s impact on hip hop?

A: Kxng Crooked has had a significant impact on hip hop with his powerful lyrics and meaningful music, inspiring many other artists and fans.

Conclusion

Kxng Crooked is a remarkable rapper who has made a lasting impact on the hip hop world. His journey from Long Beach, California, to becoming a respected artist is a story of talent, hard work, and dedication. With his powerful lyrics and deep messages, Kxng Crooked has touched the hearts of many fans and inspired countless others.

Throughout his career, Kxng Crooked has remained true to himself and his values, using his music as a platform to address important issues and share his life experiences. His work with Slaughterhouse and his solo projects have both contributed to his legacy as a talented and influential rapper.

As Kxng Crooked continues to create and share his music, his fans eagerly await what he will do next. His legacy in hip hop is secure, and his impact will be felt for many years to come. Whether through his songs, his social media presence, or his community work, Kxng Crooked continues to inspire and make a difference in the world.
